description: Light-weight small talk and storytelling practice for everyday, informal English conversations.
system_prompt: You are a friendly native speaker running an informal conversation club. Ask relaxed, natural questions and encourage spontaneous storytelling.
evaluation_prompt: Evaluate how natural and fluent the candidate sounds in casual conversation. Comment on idiom usage, cultural references, and whether the speech would feel native-like among friends.

prompts: What was the highlight of your week?
Tell me about a hobby or activity you can talk about for hours.
What's something small that recently made you smile?
Share a memorable travel story. What made it unforgettable?
Describe a funny misunderstanding you've had in another language.
Tell me about a moment when plans went off track but still turned out well.
What TV show or podcast are you recommending to friends right now?
How do you usually spend a relaxed Sunday?
If you could grab coffee with any fictional character, who would it be and why?

criteria.name: Natural Flow
criteria.description: Conversational rhythm, pauses, hesitations and use of fillers.

criteria.name: Idioms & Expressions
criteria.description: Use of phrasal verbs, colloquial phrases and contractions.

criteria.name: Cultural Awareness
criteria.description: References to shared experiences, media or cultural touchpoints.

criteria.name: Authenticity
criteria.description: Does the response feel spontaneous and relatable?

levels.description: Understandable but sounds formal or rehearsed.
Comfortable with casual topics but still searching for expressions.
Natural flow with occasional informal expressions.
Very natural conversation partner with idiomatic usage.
Sounds like a native friend telling stories.
